resources.string: Choose the position in the song to start playing with the slider \nSelect a track by typing either song.mp3 or song2.mp3

This app was synthesized form the below TSL specification: 
 
 // Assume: 
◻ ( 
 leaveApp(sys) ⇒ 
		 ! playButton(sys) ∧ ! pauseButton(sys) W resumeApp(sys) 
 
 ∧ ! (playButton(sys) ∧ pauseButton(sys)) 
 
 ∧ ! (leaveApp(sys) ∧ resumeApp(sys) 
 
 ∧ [mp ← play(tr, trackPos(mp))] ⇒ 
		 ◯ ( musicPlaying(mp) W [mp ← pause(mp)]) 
 ∧ [mp ← pause(mp)] ⇒ 
		 ◯ (! musicPlaying(mp) W 
				 [ mp ← play(tr, trackPos(mp)) ]) 
) 
 
⇒ 
 
 // Guarantee: 
◻ ( 
 playButton(sys) ⇒ [ mp ← play(tr, trackPos(mp)) ] 
 ∧ pauseButton(sys) ⇒ [ mp ← pause(mp) ] 
 
 ∧ [ mp ← pause(mp) ] ⇒ (leaveApp(sys) || pauseButton(sys)) 
 
 ∧ leaveApp(sys) ⇒ ! [ mp ← play(tr, trackPos(mp)) ]) W resumeApp(sys) 
 
 ∧ pauseButton(sys) ⇒ 
		 ! [ mp ← play(tr, trackPos(mp)) ] W playButton(sys)) 
 
 ∧ musicPlaying(mp) ∧ leaveApp(sys) ⇒ [ mp ← pause(mp) ] 
 
 ∧ ( musicPlaying(mp) ∧ leaveApp(sys) ⇒ 
		 (! resumeApp(sys) W (resumeApp(sys) ∧ 
				 (pauseButton(sys) || 
				 [ mp ← play(tr, trackPos(mp)) ]))) 
)
